Zack Mayo.Action: Responds to Byron Mayo's tentative greeting and goes with him to get luggage despite uncertainty.
Responds briefly and respectfully to Byron's questions and condolences about his mother.
Nervously but openly observes the bar scene, showing curiosity and engagement.
Responds firmly to Byron's rejection and refuses to return to previous school, asserting independence.
Walks out after Byron tells him he doesn't want him, ignoring Byron's call to come back.

Refuses to accept Byron's advice to return to state school and insists on finding his own way despite the difficult environment.

Brightens and thanks Byron sincerely when Byron concedes.
Hides money given by Byron instead of sharing or openly accepting it.
Keeps moving despite Byron calling him back, showing confidence and assertiveness.

Hides money given by Byron in his shoe, demonstrating cautiousness and practical thinking.

Passively accepts direction to wait with other civilian types under a tree, showing no initiative or leadership in this moment.
